scan_summary: Critical importmap conflict identified in index.html, which is the root cause of the alias resolution failure. All other configurations and alias usages appear correct.

findings.description: A <script type="importmap"> block exists. This overrides Vite's module resolution, preventing it from transforming the '@/' alias before serving to the browser. This is the source of the error.
Correct usage of '@/' alias in the application's main entry point.
A correct alias for '@' is already defined. It will be updated to match the requested spec for maximum robustness.

vite.config.ts.notes: File exists and contains a valid alias definition for '@'. It will be updated to match the specific format requested for improved robustness.

tsconfig.json.notes: File exists and contains the correct 'baseUrl' and 'paths' configuration for TypeScript and editor intellisense.

public_directory_scan.notes: No instances of '@/' imports were found within the '/public' directory. This is correct, as these files are served statically and not processed by Vite.
